ctu_text: nic. in/"}], "schemeImageUrl": "", "detailedDescription_md": "Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme "Mukhyamantri Asangathit Karmakaar Saayakal Sahaayata Yojana" for unorganized worker on 28 April 2012.
